functions.name: monitor_blob_storage_diagnostic_setting_presence
functions.description: Checks for presence of blob storage diagnostic setting.

functions.name: monitor_diagnostic_settings_send_logs_to_log_analytics
functions.description: Checks if diagnostic settings send logs to Log Analytics.

functions.name: monitor_blob_storage_diagnostic_settings_exist
functions.description: Checks if blob storage diagnostic settings exist.

functions.name: monitor_diagnostic_setting_logs_to_log_analytics
functions.description: Checks if diagnostic setting logs are sent to Log Analytics.

notes: All functions are based on Azure Diagnostic_Settings API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
